pull_request.title: Fix #146460 context.news
pull_request.body:
Hides cookie notice, subscription banner, and newsletter forms
Fixes #146460 context.news

pull_request.title: Fix #146468 time.com
pull_request.body:
Hides annoying magazine promo banner and popup
Fixes #146468 time.com

pull_request.title: Fix #146472 date-fns.org
pull_request.body: Hides newsletter subscription form on date-fns.org

issue.title: nectarsleep.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Microsoft Edge

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.nectarsleep.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard DNS filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

logs-01.loggly.com

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: quantamagazine.org

labels.name: Stale
labels.description: The issue is considered as obsolete

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

ubo 1.43

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.quantamagazine.org/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Cookie notice banner (requires removing class `.cookie-not-accepted` from `#app` element to fix nav once cookie banner is removed)
  ```
  quantamagazine.org#%#//scriptlet('remove-class', 'cookie-not-accepted', '#app')
  quantamagazine.org#$#.disclosure-notification { display: none !important; }
  ```

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/110956608/183979685-9b76c461-3d04-4c9a-b0b7-af03621fa511.png)

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

ubo 1.44

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.valeriewai.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. popup

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/110956608/187586631-95cccee2-49c6-44d9-9f40-dd21dc864048.png)

</details>
